ModMetaData.name: Mines - Cupro's alloys patch
ModMetaData.author: AngleWyrm
ModMetaData.description:
Adds to the Mines mod the ability to excavate base materials from Cupro's Alloys mod.
* Copper ore - Copper 1.5 silver 1/5 hr (500 ticks) * Cassiterite - Tin 0.7 silver 1/11 hr (232 ticks) * Galena - Lead 1.2 silver 1/6 hr (400 ticks) * Bauxite - Aluminum 0.9 silver 1/8 hr (300 ticks)
